allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=123456 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U legal_admin -d legal_ai_db -c "CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS vector; SELECT extname FROM pg_extension WHERE extname = ''vector'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=123456 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U legal_admin -d legal_ai_db -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''public'' AND table_name LIKE ''%ai_responses%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%grpo%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%recommendation%'' ORDER BY table_name;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=123456 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U legal_admin -d legal_ai_db -c "SELECT id, query, legal_domain, confidence FROM ai_responses LIMIT 1;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=123456 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U legal_admin -d legal_ai_db -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ai_responses;")
